<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description/><local_or_existing>Existing</local_or_existing><name>x_1837836_hr_cas_1_hr_case</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[// Allow admins and hr_admins to always update
if (gs.hasRole('admin') || gs.hasRole('x_1837836_hr_cas_1.hr_admin') || gs.hasRole('x_1837836_hr_cas_0.admin')) {
    answer = true;
} else {
    // Get the display value of the state (e.g., 'New', 'In Progress', 'Closed', 'Cancelled')
    var stateDisplay = current.state.getDisplayValue();

    // Block update if state is Closed or Cancelled
    if (stateDisplay == 'Closed' || stateDisplay == 'Cancelled') {
        answer = false;
    } else {
        answer = true;
    }
}
]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-01 17:20:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>ee43c8f947e1b610d1321af2e16d4390</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1837836_hr_cas_1_hr_case</sys_name><sys_package display_value="HR Case Management" source="x_1837836_hr_cas_1">e4f06aa147e57610d1321af2e16d4311</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="HR Case Management">e4f06aa147e57610d1321af2e16d4311</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_ee43c8f947e1b610d1321af2e16d4390</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-01 17:20:49</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
